se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Class ChangeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.ChangeInfo

  • public class ChangeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for storing information on changes of state parameters and other data structures. This enables e.g. optimised updates of objects that depend on the perturbed object. Info can be stored as a string and, optionally, for arrays, a list of the affected indices.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Method Detail

      • getUnion

        public static int[] getUnion(int[][] indices)
        Helper. Returns the union of (possibly overlapping) arrays of indices. If any input array is null, null is returned. The returned elements have been "uniqified" however.
        Parameters:
        elements - lists of indices.
        Returns:
        the union of the lists.

      • getChanged

        public Dependent getChanged()
        Returns the object which the information refers to.
        Returns:
        the changed object.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Returns a message or ID detailing the change.
        Returns:
        the info.

      • getAffectedElements

        public int[] getAffectedElements()
        For array-based objects which have changed, may return a list of affected elements. Typically, null should be interpreted as lacking information, in which case all elements can be considered affected.
        Returns:
        the affected elements; typically all if null.
